choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [Boss's Name],

I regret to inform you that I have decided to leave the company. It has been a pleasure working with you and the team, but I have decided it is time for me to move on. 

I will be leaving on [date] and I will ensure that all my tasks are completed before I go. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to help during this transition period. 

Thank you again for the opportunity to work with you and the team. I wish you all the best in the future. 

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
